alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:03PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis and southwestern Lake Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1203 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stoney Point, or 19 miles northeast of Superior, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Two Harbors around 1215 PM CDT. Highland Lake around 1220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Thomas Lake Near Brimson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
